amendment.description: To provide Medicare beneficiaries with an additional choice of Medicare Prescription Drug plans under part D that consists of a drug discount card and protection against high out-of-pocket drug costs.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 1012 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 1012 proposed by Senator Hagel. (consideration: CR S8493, S8495) To provide Medicare beneficiaries with an additional choice of Medicare Prescription Drug plans under part D that consists of a drug discount card and protection against high out-of-pocket drug costs.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1012 proposed by Senator Hagel.
